thread.title: Mobile Business Solutions is the Topic of an Upcoming "Voices In America" Piece with James Earl Jones for Public Television
thread.title_full: Mobile Business Solutions is the Topic of an Upcoming "Voices In America" Piece with James Earl Jones for Public Television

author: Jon Elliot
title: Mobile Business Solutions is the Topic of an Upcoming "Voices In America" Piece with James Earl Jones for Public Television
text:
James Earl Jones, as the host of the “VOICES IN AMERICA” program, will be covering the latest available technology, which has been made for the promotion of mobile business solutions. The forms of different mobile business solutions, which have definitely changed along with the many different advances in the field of mobile technology, will be explained on the “VOICES IN AMERICA” program. The world of mobile technology is constantly changing. More and more people today are using their mobile devices as mini computers. Mobile devices have advanced to the point where they are more advanced than their full desktop computer counterparts of several years ago. A mobile device today can carry more processing capability than a top of the line computer from several years ago.
Along with the changes in the field of mobile technology, there have been changes with mobile business solutions. Mobile business solutions are now entering a new era of advances and the “VOICES IN AMERICA” program will explain those new advances to help its audience understand and take advantage of the latest mobile business solutions technologies.
Mobile business solutions have experienced many advances which place them currently leaps and bounds ahead of where they were several years ago. More and more people are on the move today. This new breed of mobile business people will find themselves using their mobile devices more than they did previously.
“VOICES IN AMERICA” is an independent production, which is distributed to public television stations around the US. It is not affiliated with PBS.
